name: Ultimate Sin!
description:
Stab your way out of Hell and beyond in this wacky BLOONS-STYLE game with a horrific twist! Knife past demons, suicidal business men and even slaughter across waves of angels to commit the ULTIMATE SIN!

CONTROLS: 

Move with A and D
Jump with Spacebar

If you have accolated enough hits, you will gain an AIR JUMP.
Space bar air jumps.

If you have accolated enough hits, and have the WINGS, you an fly briefly.
Space bar use wings.
